history.proof: intros E. unfold INC, Class_succ. intros x H. hauto lq: on use: IN_Paire_left, IN_Union.

exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable x.

original: intros E. unfold INC, Class_succ. intros x H. unfold Union, Paire. split. - intros y [H1|H1]. + rewrite H1. apply IN_Paire_left. + rewrite H1. apply IN_Paire_right. apply IN_Sing. - intros y H1. apply IN_Class_succ.
